H0.text: what is on a mcchicken sandwich from mcdonalds. Ranch Dressing

H1.text: what is on a mcchicken sandwich from mcdonalds. BBQ Sauce

H2.text: what is on a mcchicken sandwich from mcdonalds. Honey Mustard

H3.text: what is on a mcchicken sandwich from mcdonalds. mayonnaise

A4.text: It consists of a toasted wheat bun, a breaded patty, shredded lettuce and mayonnaise.

A5.text: the McChicken (and the Hot 'n Spicy) could be ordered as a Buffalo Ranch McChicken, which is a McChicken with Buffalo and Ranch sauce instead of mayonnaise.

A6.text: Mayonnaise is a thick, creamy sauce with a rich and tangy taste that is commonly used on sandwiches.

A7.text: Mayonnaise is an emulsion of oil, egg yolk, and an acid, either vinegar or lemon juice.
